divs: Sighting DetailsOne night when i was in my room getting ready for bed i looked out of my apartment window and i saw a bright light over the montain.I thought it was just a plane or helicopter but it turn so bright i just could not look away.It turn into a really bright white light and was moving really fast but didnt not leave the moutain top.This went on for minutes.I shouted my brothers name so he can see what i saw and he couldnt believe it either.After four minutes, we saw a helicopter fly towards the mountain but as the helicopter came closer to the ufo, the ufo just vanished.I was shocked.But when the helicopter was gone, the ufo appeared and got really bright again for one more minute but then vanished for good.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 2 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around October 20th 2008
Summary: The ufo appeared on top on a mountain and moved left to right slowly.
